bstringr 0.1.0

Calculate protein molecular weight

calc_MW_peptide.Rd

Calculate protein molecular weight

calc_MW_peptide(astrobj)

Arguments

astrobj

astr object.

Examples

astr_rand_seq(3, 100) %>% calc_MW_peptide()
#> # A tibble: 60 x 8
